title: Refine project card sections
description: Remove status line, move repo link into title, add section headers, and include stability in deployment section.
notes: Changes: removed status detail line, moved repo link into clickable title, added section headers (Description, Deployment, Base files, Tech stack, Future ideas), added stability badge in deployment section, and adjusted styling. Files: script.js, style.css, TODO.md. Verify: load page and confirm sections render with consistent headers and title links to repo.
close_reason: Refined card sections and deployment stability.

title: Remove quick start section and adjust deployment status
description: Drop quick start callout and replace deployment stability label with live/working status for deployed apps.
notes: Changes: removed quick start rendering/styling and quickStart data; added deploy.live boolean and show Live/Not live in deployment badges. Files: projects.json, script.js, style.css, TODO.md. Verify: load page and confirm quick start is gone and deployment badge reflects live status.
close_reason: Removed quick start and switched deployment status to live/not live.

title: Render projects in JS
description: Fetch projects.json and render project cards with optional fields handled gracefully.
notes: Changes: implemented fetch/render for projects.json with optional demo/future handling and safe DOM creation. Files: script.js. Verification: ran python3 http.server and fetched /index.html and /projects.json successfully; manual browser render should show project cards without console errors.
close_reason: Closed

title: Define project status values and prominence
description: Clarify status meanings, update demo/one-off repo status, and make status display more prominent.
notes: Changes: added status detail line per project and tuned status label styling; set ScanReconciliationTool to Demo. Files: script.js, style.css, projects.json, TODO.md. Verify: serve site (ex: python -m http.server) and open index.html; confirm status pill + status description render and ScanReconciliationTool shows Demo.
close_reason: Completed status definition and demo labeling.

title: Define default intelligent ordering
description: Add a default static ordering for projects now; dynamic later.
notes: Changes: added explicit order field per project and sorted client-side before render. Files: projects.json, script.js, TODO.md. Verify: serve site and confirm project cards appear in the configured order.
close_reason: Added default ordering fields and sorting.

title: Add newly cloned repos to projects.json
description: Scan /home/jirving/projects/github for new repos and add structured entries to projects.json.
close_reason: Added new repos to projects.json and verified local render.

title: GitHub Pages compatibility
description: Ensure relative paths and fetch work locally and on GitHub Pages.
notes: Changes: kept relative fetch to projects.json and added file:// guidance message when local file access blocks fetch. Files: script.js. Verification: served locally via python3 http.server and confirmed 200 responses for index.html and projects.json; should work on GitHub Pages with relative paths.
close_reason: Closed

title: Base Structure: scaffold core files
description: Create index.html, style.css, script.js, and projects.json in repo root. Ensure index.html loads without errors.
notes: Verification: ran 'python3 -m http.server 8000 --bind 127.0.0.1' (escalated due to sandbox port restrictions) and received HTTP 200 for /index.html via curl. Page loads locally.
close_reason: Closed

title: Sync project list with current GitHub repos
description: Use GitHub CLI to refresh repo names/archived status and update projects.json accordingly.
notes: Removed status subtext from card UI and added TODO for default intelligent ordering. Files: script.js, style.css, TODO.md.
close_reason: Completed: synced repo names/archived status via gh and updated projects.json/UI.

title: Add styling
description: Create clean, readable CSS with card layout and mobile-friendly spacing.
notes: Verification: served locally via python3 http.server and confirmed index.html/projects.json respond with 200; manually inspect in browser for layout and mobile responsiveness.
close_reason: Closed

title: Add last updated dates to projects
description: Include last updated date for each project and project-index data; render in UI.
notes: Changes: reshaped projects.json to include updatedAt and per-project lastUpdated; added status meta block to show last updated; render index data updated label in header. Unknown lastUpdated values left null for private repos (GitHub API 404). Files: projects.json, script.js, index.html, style.css, TODO.md. Verify: serve site (ex: python3 -m http.server) and confirm header shows index data updated date plus per-card last updated line.
close_reason: Added last-updated data fields and rendering for index/project entries.

title: Show base files present for repos
description: Indicate presence of base files (README, AGENTS.md, Makefile, .gitignore, LICENSE, etc.) in project cards.
notes: Changes: added baseFiles per project via GitHub API (unknown for private/404), rendered base files chips in cards, and added styling. Files: projects.json, script.js, style.css, TODO.md. Verify: serve site and confirm Base files section appears with present/missing/unknown badges.
close_reason: Added base file presence data and UI.

title: Add deployment type field
description: Add deployment type (e.g., Render, GitHub Pages) and optional links for deployed apps.
notes: Changes: added deploy metadata for project-index (GitHub Pages) and cpm-detail (Render) and rendered deployment line with optional link. Files: projects.json, script.js, style.css, TODO.md. Verify: serve site and confirm Deployment line appears on matching cards with link for project-index.
close_reason: Added deployment type metadata and UI.

title: Basic HTML skeleton

notes: Index.html already includes header/title, intro paragraph, projects container, and links to style.css/script.js. Criteria met; no changes needed.
